name: Jimmy Kimmel
monologue: We have the Olympics in 2028. Only 11 more years, and then volleyball! I feel like between climate change and Kim Jong Un it’s optimistic to think we’ll still have a Los Angeles in 2028.

name: Jimmy Kimmel
monologue: The slogan for the Olympics is “Follow the Sun,” which is great advice if you want people walking directly into the ocean.

name: Jimmy Kimmel
monologue: I’m excited about the Olympics being here, but I hope they really go for it. I’m going to start a movement to try to get them to let Snoop Dogg light the torch with a big red, white, and blue blunt. Have an L.A. Olympics!
